update_every.title: Update every
update_every.description: The frequency, in seconds, at which data is collected from systemd.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The timeout, in seconds, for connecting and querying systemd's D-Bus endpoint.

include.title: Include
include.description: Configuration for monitoring specific systemd units. Include systemd units whose names match any of the specified patterns. Patterns follow the syntax of shell file name patterns.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).
